questions.question: What is the functionality of the ComfyUI_TextAssets node?
questions.answer: The ComfyUI_TextAssets node allows you to upload text files to an input folder from your local computer.

questions.question: Can I upload images or videos using the ComfyUI_TextAssets node?
questions.answer: No, the ComfyUI_TextAssets node is specifically designed for uploading text files, not images or videos.

questions.question: Where does the text file get uploaded when using ComfyUI_TextAssets?
questions.answer: When using ComfyUI_TextAssets, the text file gets uploaded to an input folder.
